thread.title: excellent position for site seeing. Lovely hotel and staff
thread.title_full: excellent position for site seeing. Lovely hotel and staff - Review of The Trafalgar Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ju159
title: excellent position for site seeing. Lovely hotel and staff
text: Stayed for 1 night to go sight seeing and see a show for husbands 50th. The hotel left a surprise birthday cake in our room which was really nice of them. Staff were lovely, friendly and helpful. Breakfast was really good with plenty to choose from. The hotel checked us in early so we could go off and looked after our bags all day after we had checked out. Would defiantly come back to tis hotel , excellent position, excellent staff and an amazingly comfortable bed !!!!
